channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After the CDC shooting, federal workers pressure RFK Jr. for more protections

item.title: Greetings from the Dubai airport, where a long layover can also be a destination
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Trump Calls Netanyahu a ‘War Hero’ and Adds: ‘I Guess I Am Too’
item.description: President Trump praised Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel for bombing Iranian nuclear sites, and credited himself as well.
